title:
How do I go about getting an arrest report from Brunswick or Columbus Counties Thank-you, have a great day.

Steve
text:
You can call the Brunswick County Sheriff's Office at (910) 253-2777
or visit the office on Government Center Drive, off of Old Ocean
Highway, in Bolivia.



The Columbus County Sheriff's Office is at 805 Washington St.,
Whiteville, NC  28472. The phone number there is (910) 642-6551.
